Es ist zwar ein altes, aber sehr ikonisches Spiel, das wirklich Spaß macht und einem nicht den Spaß versaut. Headshots Gegnern zuzufügen ist viel leichter und gibt mir ein echt super gutes Gefühl. Ich habe erst damit angefangen, aber durch die Zeit von CS:GO funktioniert es viel besser!

Yes, yes, YES. I finally got the game for myself. I grinded a lot but I eventually bought it. Oh boy where should I start. Ah yes the...

1. Gameplay

This game is from 2004 and suprisingly the gameplay improved very much. Like a LOT. going from a very percise shots to more realistic shot was a big Improvement. Before I bought this game I did some research (unlike whit Dead by Daylike) and after looking at pros destroy pretty much everyone I decided It was something for me. The first game I played in the franchise was CS:GO(Counter Strike: Global Offensiv. Its free on steam so you can also try it out). I like it but my potato Laptop couldnt handle it very much. I then began researching about what other CS games are out there and then I came to the decision that I will buy Counter Strike: Source (CSS from now on). I liked the gameplay, the weapons, the graphics (especialy my laptop) and the physiks of this now almost 2 decade old game. 

2. Multiplayer
I always wanted to play competitivly on any game (exept Dead by Daylight) but my potatoe couldnt handle the Ultr4 g!Ga m3gA graphics. So since my life regret (Dead by Daylight) I began playing older games like Dark Souls, Bioshock, Fallout 3/NV, CS 1.6/CZ (Condition Zero) and many more games. The only "weird" thing about is that you can also grind achievments in offline mode (whit bots). Thats the only weird thing I found about this game. Now I may have 4 hours of playtime at the time I am writing this but I do know that this games is near perfection. There is no campain if your courius (just like in all the other CS games out there. I pointed this out just for those who are looking for a good CS game and not really knowing much about the franchise). I just grindid my way to a rare achievment whit players of course because, if you ply whit bots you will just get worse and worse. I learned that leason the hard way. Trust me on that one. So yeah. I currently have 32/147! achievments so I still got a lot to play. If your an achievment hunter, this is the game for you.

3. Community
Now I dont really like talking that much whit stangers online because I am an introvert ultra pro max. But there might be some arseholes on the game who might have had a rough day and just want to take it out on some newb or player. Those people are like playong since day 1 so they might get pissed of if they ever get killed or backstabed. Just ignore them.

Now enough writing. If you just skipped to this bit then your at the wrong place but if you want a short sentance about how I personally feel about the game then here it is: Hell yeah! Take my money you bastards. 
Now thank you for reading my review. Hope it helped you out. If it did then give me a thumbs up or just leave a quick comment on how you personally feel about this game or just let me know if this review helped you out. Oh yeah, and one more thing. The community on CSS is getting smaller (atleast here in the EU). So please, PLEASE support the creators and make this community alive again. I dont know who is going to read this in 2020 but here it is. Have yourself a nice day/night
Good bye

Игра отличная, практически на каждом сервере встречает приятная компания, которая добра к вам точно так же, как ваша семья. Однозначно хотел бы посоветовать эту игру, если не удалите ее через пару минут на первом попавшемся сервере из-за профессионолизма игроков, то затянет на многие часы.

Игра по графике хороша даже сейчас. Не понимаю почему люди прям так сильно её недооценили мне нравится в этой игре физика (не то что в Counter-Strike:Global Offensive). И коммюнити здесь куда получше чем в той же CS:GO
Хоть игра была выпущена в 2004 году для меня она остаётся одной из самых любимых серий игр Counter-Strike.
Вот и весь мой недо-обзор. Спасибо за внимание :D

Es de los mejores Counter-Strike; un juego con buenos gráficos para ser 2004, tiene muchas cosas más que el CS 1.6 y el CS:CZ.

Tiene una buena comunidad, no hay cheaters como en CS:GO y en los servidores siempre hay admins. Corre en casi cualquier PC, así que si no te corre el CS:GO este juego es una muy buena opción ya que tampoco es tan caro.

12/

Постоянный онлайн, общительные игроки, горячая атмосфера и справедливые администраторы.
Микрофон можно использовать лицам старше шестнадцати лет.
Заходи к нам на сервер чаще и просто получай удовольствие.

Игра приятно удивила. До этого в неё не играл. Это не ремейк кс 1.6. Графика на уровне. Стрельба, карты - всё хорошо. Плюсом есть ачивки. Онлайн есть, пусть и не такой большой. 2-3 заполненных сервака всегда найдёте. Рекомендую хотя бы для ознакомления тем, кто не играет в кс:го из-за коммьюнити.

It's obviously a pretty old game now but it runs great on a lot of old and new low end hardware. I use it as a bench mark for the computers that can't handle CS:GO. I can't say I've ever been a real CS enthusiast. I used to play a lot of combat arms back in the day because it was a free-to-play game.
